comment: Relative easy class, there is one group project to beware of. The prof is relatively good, gave credit as my group project was missing a person, constant reminders of due dates, extended an assignment for  Easter.
She is so amazing. Art is truly a useful topic in life. She taught me how to officially put the fries in the bag

TAKE HER. Easy quizzes, can check if your answer is right (not lockdown browser, so can look at book too). Most annoying thing are the art criticisms, which aren't too hard, just put the work in and you should get a good grade. The final is a bit ridiculous, 100 questions on random things through the sem, so you can't  really study but not too hard
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Gives good feedback

comment: Her figure drawing class will push you to grasp proportions of the human body. The key things to remember when taking her class is time management and attendance. Group and class critique are mandatory. You will spend most of class drawing live models. I would not take the class again because she made a strange racially specific comment to me.

Loved this class, haven't taken final yet. Take her! Grading is very fair. Multiple quizzes but they come with check ur answer button to help you get better answers& the quizzes balance out ur overall grade. Only things u do-a few art criticism essays ( she goes over what u need to write throughly), quizzes, short discussion boards,& a final.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: She was amazing for the most part. There were weekly quizzes but if you just apply yourself to the course like you would with any other class then it shouldn't be that bad. The class overall was interesting. If you need an easy online class then I would recommend!
rating_tags: Get ready to read--EXTRA CREDIT--Lots of homework

comment: class is extremely boring. If you want easy with little work it is good, but the way she grades the art criticisms is ridiculous. She grades based on her own personal opinions and expects the most.

Although I cannot speak to her in-person teaching, she is a kind genuine person. Sadly, the content of the class was uninteresting and unengaging. Textbook based class, with quizzes for 13 chapters. 3 Art Criticism Papers and 1 Formal Analysis (essay or artwork alt.) 1 cumulative final (no resources to help cover the 13 chapters) TAKE NOTES!!!
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Clear grading criteria
